description: Professor Belmondo`s Magnezone was sent out to battle after Black Citroid was defeated in battle by Clembot. He forced it to battle hard and yelled at it if it was too slow or dawdling during the battle. Clemont studied Professor Belmondo battle style by observing the way the Black Citroid battled and Clemont`s Luxray was easily able to defeat Professor Belmondo`s Magnezone allowing Officer Jenny to arrest the professor.
name: Jibacoil (Belmondo Kyouju)
